name: Letter to Patches
caption:
A written request from Volcano Manor addressed to Patches disclosing the name of a Tarnished to be hunted.

"Great Horned Tragoth"

He can be found at the Ruin-Strewn Precipice. Find the red mark on your map for the exact location.
info:
Request from Volcano Manor, addressed to Patches.

<?keyicon@31?> Examine

name: Letter to Bernahl
caption:
A written request from Volcano Manor addressed to Bernahl disclosing the names of two Tarnished to be hunted.

"Vargram the Raging Wolf"
"Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm"

Both men can be found in the Royal Capital of Leyndell. Find the red mark on your map for the exact location.
info:
Request from Volcano Manor, addressed to Bernahl.

<?keyicon@31?> Examine

name: Knifeprint Clue
caption: A simple map given by Fia.
info:
Shows the location of a black knifeprint.

<?keyicon@31?> Examine

name: "Homing Instinct" Painting
caption:
Work of a wandering artist.

This painter is said to have captured the landscapes seen during the last moments of those welcomed into death's embrace.
info:
The soul of the painter, and vestiges of the dead's last moments can be discovered by visiting the location depicted.

name: About Marika's Effigy at the Roundtable
caption:
The effigy of Marika at the Roundtable Hold can be used to enter Colosseum combat.

Your preferred ruleset may be chosen from those of Colosseums already visited.
info:
Information about the effigy of Marika at the Roundtable Hold.
